A spellstriker staff is wrought iron with gleaming arcane sigils etched into its surface and a sharp point at the bottom. Used as a weapon, the staff is a +2 striking shifting staff.

Activate F (concentrate)

Frequency once per hour

Trigger You use Spellstrike with a non-cantrip spell and miss with the Strike

Effect An explosion of magical energy—stored up for the Spellstrike—explodes out. All creatures in a @Template[emanation|distance:5] take 1d6 damage per rank of the spell, with a @Check[reflex|against:spell|basic|options:area-effect] save against your spell DC. This damage is the same type the spell would have dealt, and the activation gains that trait; if the spell would have dealt multiple types of damage, choose one of them. If the damage of the explosion is mental, the save is @Check[will|against:spell|basic|options:area-effect] instead of Reflex.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Ignition]
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Echoing Weapon], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Sure Strike]
  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Acid Grip], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Telekinetic Maneuver]
  • 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Echoing Weapon], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Haste]
  • 4th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Acid Grip], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Weapon Storm]

Craft Requirements You have the magus's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Spellstrike] activity. Supply one casting of all listed ranks of all listed spells.
